document_data.name: Laskal
document_data.mainbody: '''Laskal''' was a leader within the [[Shadow Druids]] who operated within the [[Cloak Wood]] forest during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: As of the late 1360s [[DR]], Laskal was considered rather old for a human.
document_data.Personality: He considered himself to be the "protector" of the Cloak Wood forest and carried himself as a diplomat of the organization.
document_data.Relationships: He worked alongside [[Faldorn]], who later became one of the Shadow Druids' most renowned leaders.
document_data.History: When the [[Iron Throne]] established their [[Cloak Wood mine|mine]] within the Cloak Wood forest in the {{YearlinkName|1365}}, they made made enemies of the forest's Shadow Druids. A mere few years later, Laskal and his companions sought to rid the forest of their corrupting presence.
